name: playerCount
description: The Number of players participating in the given game.

name: selectionDuration
description: how many seconds do participants have to complete a tangram selection trial

name: feedbackDuration
description: how many seconds the feedback is displayed for

name: listenerBonus
description: how much a listener is paid per correct answer (in cents)

name: speakerBonus
description: how much bonus the speaker gets *per listener* who gets it right

name: rotateSpeaker
description: is there one speaker for the whole game or does it rotate

name: chat
description: do the listeners get real chat, or are they limited

name: rotateInterval
description: how many trials a speaker gets at a time, default 12
